snippet: On the third day of his visit to Alaska, President Obama delivered promises of new aid for Arctic communities whose shorelines and infrastructure are crumbling because of rising temperatures.
abstract: Political Memo; Pres Obama visits Kotzebue, Alaska, to warn about ravages of climate change and to promise Arctic communities, which are already suffering due to higher global temperatures, more aid; Obama delivers speech outlining federal efforts to help with issue; trip is first by sitting president to arctic Alaska.
lead_paragraph: On the third day of his visit to Alaska, President Obama delivered promises of new aid for Arctic communities whose shorelines and infrastructure are crumbling because of rising temperatures.

headline.print_headline: Obama Takes Climate Message Where Change Is Rapid
headline.main: Obama Takes Climate Message to Alaska, Where Change Is Rapid
